name: To Remember or not to Remember
name_original: To Remember or not to Remember
description:
WARNING : contains child abuse

(I apologize in advance for any grammar/spelling mistakes. This is also the second game I've made so don't expect too much.)

This game is about a boy who woke up without his memories and his journey back into his past in an attempt to retrieve his memories. However, the more he looks back the more he realizes that maybe it's best to leave whatever that happened buried up.
